topPRs.title: bump version for release
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
> [!NOTE] > Prepares a new release with dependency updates and a refreshed lockfile. > > - **Version bump**: `package.json` updated from `1.3.6` to `1.3.7` > - **Dependency update**: `@elizaos/core` upgraded from `^1.7.0` to `^1.7.2` > - **Lockfile refresh**: `bun.lock` re-resolved, updating numerous transitive deps (e.g., `esbuild`, `rollup`, `@discordjs/*`, `libsodium`, `ws`, `langchain`, `zod`); adds `configVersion: 1` > - No source code changes > > Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 0b72a46264544317e62abb5fe74b227bf2a5a696. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).

Greptile Summary

This PR bumps the plugin version from 1.3.6 to 1.3.7 and updates the `@elizaos/core` dependency from ^1.7.0 to ^1.7.2. - Plugin version incremented by patch level (1.3.6 → 1.3.7) - Core dependency updated to ^1.7.2 to pick up recent fixes - Lock file automatically updated with transitive dependency changes

Confidence Score: 5/5

- This PR is safe to merge with minimal risk - Simple version bump following semantic versioning. The core dependency update is a patch-level change that aligns with recent bug fixes in the repository. Lock file changes are automatically generated and consistent with the dependency update. - No files require special attention

Important Files Changed

| Filename | Overview | |----------|----------| | package.json | Version bumped from 1.3.6 to 1.3.7, `@elizaos/core` dependency updated from ^1.7.0 to ^1.7.2 | | bun.lock | Lock file updated to reflect dependency changes, including transitive dependencies |

Sequence Diagram

```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant Dev as Developer participant PKG as package.json participant LOCK as bun.lock participant REG as npm Registry Dev->>PKG: Bump version 1.3.6 → 1.3.7 Dev->>PKG: Update @elizaos/core ^1.7.0 → ^1.7.2 Dev->>LOCK: Run bun install LOCK->>REG: Resolve @elizaos/core@^1.7.2 REG-->>LOCK: Return dependency tree LOCK->>LOCK: Update transitive dependencies Note over LOCK: @discordjs/builders 1.12.2 → 1.13.1
@discordjs/formatters 0.6.1 → 0.6.2
@discordjs/util 1.1.1 → 1.2.0
and others LOCK-->>Dev: Lock file updated ``` ## Summary by CodeRabbit * **Chores** * Bumped package version to 1.3.7. * Updated core dependency to ^1.7.2 for enhanced stability and compatibility. ✏️ Tip: You can customize this high-level summary in your review settings.
